entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'Harry' throughout the text. (Excerpt: 'H ARRY POTTER', 'All right there, Harry?')

entities.name: fred weasley

entities.name: marcus flint
entities.description: A Slytherin player who is being targeted by the Bludger. (Excerpt: 'beat the Bludger furiously towards Marcus Flint')

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Someone who is commentating on the game. (Excerpt: 'Lee Jordan was saying')

entities.name: adrian pucey
entities.description: A Slytherin player who drops the ball. (Excerpt: 'Adrian Pucey dropped the')

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The object that Harry and Wood's are trying to catch. (Excerpt: 'for some sign of the Snitch', 'was that the Snitch?')

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: A ball-like object that is being used in the game. (Excerpt: 'a Bludger decided to come pelting his way')

relationships.description: Harry is searching for the Snitch in the game. (Excerpt: 'Once he caught sight of a flash of gold but it was just a reflection from one of the Weasleys' wristwatches, and once a Bludger decided to come pelting his way')
Harry is dodging a Bludger in the game. (Excerpt: 'but Harry dodged it and Fred Weasley came chasing after it')
Fred Weasley is chasing after a Bludger in the game. (Excerpt: 'but Harry dodged it and Fred Weasley came chasing after it')

Lee Jordan is commenting on Adrian Pucey's actions in the game. (Excerpt: 'Lee Jordan was saying. 'Chaser Pucey ducks two Bludgers, two Weasleys and Chaser Bell and speeds towards the – wait a moment – was that the Snitch?')
Adrian Pucey is dropping the ball near the Snitch. (Excerpt: 'A murmur ran through the crowd as Adrian Pucey dropped the')
